snippet: Amid speculation that John Farrell could be considered to take over the Red Sox if Bobby Valentine is let go, the Blue Jays skipper said before Friday’s game he was concentrating on his current job.
abstract: MLB Roudup; Tampa Bay Rays defeat the Texas Rangers, 3-1, in 11 innings; other baseball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Amid speculation that John Farrell could be considered to take over the Red Sox if Bobby Valentine is let go, the Blue Jays skipper said before Friday’s game he was concentrating on his current job.

headline.main: Pitchers’ Duel Ends Abruptly With Tampa Bay Home Run
headline.print_headline: Pitchers’ Duel Ends Abruptly With Tampa Bay Home Run
